short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for Chrome that redirects the user to the old version of Reddit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension automatically redirects users from the new version of Reddit to the old version, ensuring a seamless browsing experience. Key features include:

- Redirects all www.reddit.com URLs to old.reddit.com
- Redirects Reddit gallery URLs to old Reddit comments
- Allows specific Reddit paths without redirection
- Removes the Accept header for specific Reddit image domains

With a focus on user privacy, this extension does not collect, store, share, or sell any data. Enjoy the classic Reddit interface effortlessly with this lightweight and efficient extension.
